item.title: MLND-Machine Learning Algorithm Performance Evaluation Metrics
item.description: Type Name Definition Shortcomings Classification Accuracy number of correctly identified instances / all instances Not ideal for skewed data. Not ideal for situations that you care one classification more than the rest. For example, if you create a model to predict cancer, you may care more about whether the people have cancer other than he does not. Classification Precision Classification Recall Classification Confusion Matrix Classification F1 Score Regression Mean Absolute Error Regression Mean Squared Error
